entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
